item.title: Lecture 10: NumPy
item.description: Prep Point your browser to http://colab.research.google.com Open notebook 2020/ipynb/numpy.ipynb from https://github.com/nekrut/BMMB554 Numpy: Operations with multidimensional data This notebook is based (with some modifications) on a NumPy tutorial by J.R. Johansson # Import MatPlotlib so we can look at some pretty plots # The reson for doing this will become clear in out MatPlotLib lecture next week %matplotlib inline import matplotlib.pyplot as plt Introduction The numpy package (module) is used in almost all numerical computation using Python.
